subtitle: Brand sites to delight and excite prospective EV customers
description: Chevrolet electric is a marketing website to showcase the latest electric vehicles customers can purchase or preorder from General Motors. The site was built using TypeScript, React, NextJS, and Strapi.

images.alt: Chevrolet Electric Bolt EUV 2023 Hero section
Chevrolet Electric request information leads form

subtitle: Custom built website generation tool
description: Ultra Compose is an initiative to build a custom website creation solution (similar to SquareSpace or Wix) designed with the General Motors business needs in mind. Built With React, TypeScript, React Query, Quarkus, and Jotai. Since it is an in-house tool I cannot provide images.  Photo above is by Ketut Subiyanto.

subtitle: Graphic design portfolio website
description: LSR Creative is a graphic design portfolio website I built for my wife. The website was built it using JavaScript, React, NextJS, GraphQL and GraphCMS.

subtitle: Mock employee directory project
urlLabel: Kendall Rundquist's Treehouse Project 5 Source Code Link
description: Project 5 of the Full Stack JavaScript TechDegree program offered by Team Treehouse. The assignment was to build an employee directory using the RandomUser Generator API, JavaScript, and AJAX.

subtitle: Mock photo gallery application
description: Project 7 of the Full Stack JavaScript TechDegree program offered by Team Treehouse. The assignment was to build photo gallery using the Flickr API, React, AJAX and JavaScript.
urlLabel: Kendall Rundquist's Treehouse Project 7 Source Code Link

subtitle: Mock school course full-stack application
description: Project 10 of the Full Stack JavaScript TechDegree program offered by Team Treehouse. The assignment was to bring together everything learned throughout the program into a full stack school course app.  The app allowed users to sign up or sign in, and create, update, or delete courses. Built with React, SQL, and Express.
urlLabel: Kendall Rundquist's Treehouse Project 10 Source Code Link
